definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: We recycle about 96,000 metric tons of plastic annually.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年可回收约96，000公吨的塑料。

sentences.english: Boots made of recycled plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 可回收塑料袋制作的靴子。

sentences.english: Two durable buckets make it simple to sort recyclables and trash.
sentences.chinese: 两项持久桶使其简单排序可回收物和垃圾。

sentences.english: These lovely little "toys" are also made of rocks and recycling materials.
sentences.chinese: 这些可爱的小偶人也是用石头和可回收材料制成的。

sentences.english: The results show that burning vaporised methanol can recover some heat of the exhaust gas.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，掺烧甲醇蒸气可回收部分排气废热。

sentences.english: ORBIS Corporation is engaged in designing and manufacturing returnable plastic packaging.
sentences.chinese: 奥比斯公司是一家从事设计和制造可回收塑料包装。

sentences.english: You should put that in the recycle bin next to the trashcan.
sentences.chinese: 你应该放进紧挨废物桶的那个可回收垃圾箱里。

sentences.english: These modern toothbrushes made from 100% recyclable material.
sentences.chinese: 这些时尚的牙刷用100%可回收利用原料制成。

sentences.english: PET is among the most recyclable of plastics and is accepted in curbside recycling programs.
sentences.chinese: PET是最可回收的塑料和被接受的路边回收项目。

sentences.english: The wireline retrievable drill lock assembly is the heart of the casing drilling system.
sentences.chinese: 带电缆可回收的钻井锁组合是套管钻井的核心部分。

sentences.english: He also likes the recyclability of aluminum.
1Keep a separate basket for recyclable paper.
sentences.chinese: 1单独使用一个纸篓用于可回收纸张。

sentences.english: Colorful spider silks can be recycled.
sentences.chinese: 彩色蜘蛛丝所料材质，可回收。
包括可回收材料的储存区。
使用可回收利用的购物袋。

sentences.english: Mother liquors containing recoverable amounts of BPCs are frequently re-used.
sentences.chinese: 包含可回收原料药的母液通常可以再次使用。

definition: to recycle/to reclaim/to retrieve/to recover/to recall (a defective product)
carton (e.g. for milk or juice)/Tetra Pak
